ygData.subject: Re: High Pass Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t.  I m sorry to make it sound so blunt, but HighPass is terrible.  I never advise anyone to go there.  Eastern Karana has another exit than HighPass.
ygData.messageBody:
Don't. I'm sorry to make it sound so blunt, but HighPass is terrible. I
never advise anyone to go there. Eastern Karana has another exit than
HighPass. That is to the Beholder's maze. It's terrible too, but you get a
running chance. It brings you to RunneyEye. A bit better than HighPass.
That brings you to Misty Thicket, then to Rivervale. From there go to
Kithicor Forest, which is where HighPass would have led you, if it were not
so terrible.

Travis


-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 1:01 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] High Pass Hold


From: MFerrulo@...


Ok, I''m a 9th Level Barbarian Warrior and last night I decided to make the
treacherous run from Queynos to Freeport. I got as far as High Pass Hold
when I was waylaid and killed by a gnoll soothsayer. I retrieved my corpse
and then spent an hour running around trying to find the way out of High
Pass
Hold towards Freeport. IT WAS SO FRUSTRATING!!! It was also scary as hell
seeing how I was practically naked and the only player character in the
entire zone.

Could someone please give me some advice or direction in how to get the hell

out of High Pass Hold and through to Freeport?

McBanus of Halas
